content: smoothfox s baby flower motif created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfoxlover@yahoo com ©2008 version 2 1 hook size h or hook size to obtain gauge size 6 1/4 x 6 1/4 red heart super saver 4 ply medium worsted acrylic color a baby pink color b white color c light blue hook size h 8 5 00 mm this is the first pattern i ever wrote i m sure there may be an error or two please notify me if you find one so i can correct the pattern for future crocheters my ravelry store http //www ravelry com/stores/smoothfox-crochet-designs my etsy store http //smoothfox etsy com my crochet & knit related gifts http //zazzle com/smoothfox* my blog http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com/ if you want a pdf copy of this pattern or if you crochet this item please click on this link and add your own pictures as a project on ravelry just click on the crochet hook with the words hook it near the top right side and this will add your item as a project then you can add the pictures when you have completed your project http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-baby-flower instructions using color a - chain 4 join with slip st to form a circle round 1 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet in this and all following rnds 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 repeat 2 more times join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 finish off 12 double_crochet round 2 join color b with slip st in any chain-2 space * chain 3 3 double_crochet chain 3 slip st in same space slip st in next 2 sts chain 3 3 double_crochet chain 3 slip st in same st slip st in next st slip st into chain space repeat from * around join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 finish off 8 petals 32 double_crochet round 3 working in backloops on petals join color c with slip st in top right st of any petal * chain 3 double_crochet in bl of next 4 sts treble_crochet in slip st between petals below see picture with blue needle showing where to place the stitch * repeat * to * 7 times join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 finish off 40 double_crochet 8 treble_crochet round 4 join color c with slip st in any treble_crochet chain 4 counts as treble_crochet here and in all rounds 1 treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet in same st corner made double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 9 sts double_crochet in next st * 2 treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet in next st corner made double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 9 sts double_crochet in next st * repeat * to * 2 more times join with slip st in top of beg chain-4 finish off 16 treble_crochet 8 double_crochet 36 half_double_crochet round 5 join color b with slip st in any corner chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2
